description:
* Based on a rhythm arcade game by http://anidb.net/cr10946 [Takara Tomy], entitled Pretty Rhythm.
Prism Stars are performers on the new popular ice show, Prism Show. They are superidols whose techniques, singing and fashion sense are a cut above all others. http://anidb.net/ch27775 [Aira] and http://anidb.net/ch27774 [Rhythm] are two Prism Stars whose goal is to become the best, the Prism Queen. However, the road to success is bumpy.
~ translated and adapted from official site by Cranston
